    java.lang.String Actor.unconscious​(GameMap map)
    Method that can be executed when the actor is unconscious due to natural causes or accident For example, the actor is unconscious due to them falling into a deep well.

    java.lang.String DropAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)

    java.lang.String PickUpAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    When an item is picked up, remove the item from the ground and add it to the actor's inventory.

  • Uses of GameMap in game.actions

    Methods in game.actions with parameters of type GameMap
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String AttackAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Checks if the actor has a weapon, is conscious and their ability to attack
    java.lang.String BuyAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    This will allow an Actor to buy an item from a trader if the trader can trade
    java.lang.String ConsumableAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    takes an actor and increases their stats in the way specified by the init returns a string description of the action
    java.lang.String FocusAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    increases the stats of the weapon then decreases the actors stamina the sets its focus time to 5
    java.lang.String GreatSlamAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Executes the Great Slam Action by first attacking the target actor with the full damage of the Giant Hammer then the actors around the target with half the damage of the Giant Hammer
    java.lang.String OpenGateAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Action to execute to unlock the gate
    java.lang.String SellAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    This will allow an Actor to sell an item to a trader if the trader can trade
    java.lang.String StabAndStepAction.execute​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Executes the Great Slam Action by first attacking the target actor with the Great Knife then stepping away.

  • Uses of GameMap in game.actors

    Methods in game.actors with parameters of type GameMap
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ActionList EnemyActor.allowableActions​(Actor otherActor, java.lang.String direction, GameMap map)
    checks for weapons in the other actors inventory and if there are any weapons it returns an attack action for those weapons
    ActionList ForestKeeper.allowableActions​(Actor otherActor, java.lang.String direction, GameMap map)
    Sets follow behaviour if player is within range of the enemy and then returns actionList
    ActionList RedWolf.allowableActions​(Actor otherActor, java.lang.String direction, GameMap map)
    Sets the follow behaviour in the object if the player comes within range and then returns allowable actions
    ActionList Traveller.allowableActions​(Actor otherActor, java.lang.String direction, GameMap map)
    A list of buyable actions that an actor can choose to buy from the Traveller
    Action EnemyActor.playTurn​(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
    At each turn, select a valid action to perform.
    Action Player.playTurn​(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
    simply prints current stats and then returns a menu with all possible actions in it
    Action Traveller.playTurn​(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
    Selects the action that will be performed for the current turn
    java.lang.String EnemyActor.unconscious​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    If an enemy actor dies this is what should be executed
    java.lang.String ForestKeeper.unconscious​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Drops necessary items and removes actor from map after they die
    java.lang.String HollowSoldier.unconscious​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    drops any necessary items removes the actor from the map and returns a string of those events
    java.lang.String Player.unconscious​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    when the player dies it removes them from the map and returns the death message
    java.lang.String RedWolf.unconscious​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    drops all the necessary items after actor dies and returns a string describing the events
    java.lang.String WanderingUndead.unconscious​(Actor actor, GameMap map)  

  • Uses of GameMap in game.behaviours

    Methods in game.behaviours with parameters of type GameMap
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Action AttackBehavior.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    checks to see if there is an enemy within its surroundings, if there is, it returns an attack action towards that enemy.
    Action FollowBehavior.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Finds the closest position to the target, then returns a move action for that square.
    Action WanderBehaviour.getAction​(Actor actor, GameMap map)
    Returns a MoveAction to wander to a random location, if possible.
